backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister with donation, donor, spending, and user profile types plus access control, storage lists/maps, notifications, and profile management methods.
backend/migration.mo: Contains migration logic converting old actor data to updated donor and user profile shapes with new gender and age fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requirements to frontend files and components with confidence and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like list summarizing major frontend files and their responsibilities across routing, components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base/theme variables and dark‑mode definitions customizing color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry with root div and script loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for public and admin pages and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminNotif: Admin-only notification popover listing notifications with unread count, mark-as-read, and dismiss actions using React Query hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/SpendingFo: Form for admins to record spending with amount validation, balance checks, and mutation submission.
Gatekeeper component that checks identity and admin status before rendering children, otherwise shows loading or access denied.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with status handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter profile details with validation and save mutation.
frontend/src/components/donate/DonationF: Donation form handling user data prefill, amount/phone/UTR validation, and donation submission.
frontend/src/components/donate/UpiPaymen: UPI payment instructions component providing copy-to-clipboard, deep link launch, and fallback handling.
frontend/src/components/donors/DonorsTab: Table displaying donor profiles with join date, total donated, and navigation on row click.
frontend/src/components/feedback/AccessD: Screen informing users they lack permissions and offering navigation back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/layout/AdminLayo: Admin layout wrapper enforcing admin guard and rendering a responsive navigation header with links and notifications.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer showing copyright, tagline, and a link to caffeine.ai with dynamic year and host tracking.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Main site header with live metrics, navigation, logo, donation button, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Top-level site layout adding header, footer, routed content, and view-tracking hooks.
frontend/src/components/ledger/LedgerFil: Filter panel for selecting transaction type and sort order in the ledger view.
frontend/src/components/ledger/LedgerTab: Tabular display of ledger transactions with type icons, formatted amounts, dates, and status badges.
frontend/src/components/ledger/RecentTra: Card showing the 10 most recent donation and spending records with navigation to transaction details.
frontend/src/components/ledger/SpendingB: Pie chart summarizing spending by inferred category with graceful handling of empty data.
frontend/src/config/upi.ts: Defines UPI payment configuration and generates standardized UPI intent URIs for donations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminStatus.ts: Checks whether the current authenticated user is an admin by calling the actor’s isCallerAdmin method.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login, and logout through a React context and initializes AuthClient with stored or new identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching donations, spending, metrics, and donor data using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useViewTracking.ts: Handles page‑view registration and live viewer session tracking with retries, heartbeats, and metrics invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDonationsP: Admin interface for reviewing, confirming, or declining donations, including UTR copying and status filtering.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPortalPage: Admin dashboard page showing trust balance, site metrics, and navigation to admin actions using data fetched from hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSpendingPa: Spending management page that displays current balance, a form to record spending, and a list of recent spending records.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard UI showing balances, donations, spending, and recent activity with navigation and hero content.
frontend/src/pages/DonatePage.tsx: Renders the donation page with UPI payment info, transparency details, and a donation form with identity-aware messaging.
frontend/src/pages/DonorDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed donor information and their donations, with admin-specific visibility and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/DonorsPage.tsx: Shows a donor list, switching between admin and public profiles based on user status, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/LedgerPage.tsx: Combines donations and spending records into a filterable, sortable transaction ledger with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/TransactionDetailPage: Displays detailed information for a single donation or spending record, including status, amount, and timestamp.
frontend/src/utils/approvedImage.ts: Exports the single approved image path used throughout the UI.
frontend/src/utils/donationInputNormaliz: Provides utilities to normalize and validate phone numbers, UTRs, and amount inputs for donation forms.
frontend/src/utils/formatCurrency.ts: Formats bigint currency values into INR using Indian digit grouping.
frontend/src/utils/maskUtr.ts: Masks UTR strings for public display by showing only the first and last three characters.
frontend/src/utils/phoneMask.ts: Masks phone numbers to obscure all but the first five characters.
frontend/src/utils/upiQrImage.ts: Defines the UPI QR image path, its version, and a helper to generate a cache‑busted URL.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project state, feature requirements, issues, and planned profile‑related updates.
